channel.title: Held back
channel.description:
Well since moparscape is so wise.
I got a 61% in language in summer school and that means I get held back. BUT, I aced the galileo with a 94%. If I talk to the counselors could they maybe look past it, and I also have a special ed shit next year anyway to make "good study habits"
im sure someone on here has been held back??

item.title: Held back
item.dc:creator: @Elitobot Elitobot
item.description:
@Elitobot wrote:

I was supposed to be held back in 4th and 5th grade but thats obviously not an implemented consequence in Ontario >.>.

Read full topic

item.title: Held back
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Marc does have a point you will most likely still go to the high school, middle school is to just get you started for high school, high school is so you can learn the material but also to get you ready for college. You can fail a class in middle school and still move forward, its really just high school that will keep you back for a failed class.

Read full topic

item.title: Held back
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

No offense but 8th grade was really easy for me and I really didnt put any effort into it.

But they really dont hold back people these days unless you failed like every class and werent retarded

Read full topic

they stare at you like your some kind of devil and be afraid to talk… or they just rush you; long story short: its fucked.[/quote]ill take a shit on there face.

item.title: Held back
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Tell them that, next year you will be getting a teacher that helps you will studying, origination and other techniques needed to do well in school.

Read full topic

item.title: Held back
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:7, topic:345492”]didn’t realise that.
somehow prove that 94% > currentResult; may be hard but it will take evidence like if the first test is harder or w/e[/quote]its proof that i did actually learn something there too. i understand it completely. i just dont do my homework. but the course i take next yr teaches me good study habits so itd be a waste to hold me back almost.

Read full topic

item.title: Held back
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

I have a IEP also yours may be called something else, if you read your you might be able to find something to use as a reason for you to be able to get a pass with your 94% added you might be able to persuade your counselor to help you get a pass.

I should also say that if you do have a IEP like thing you should see if you can add in extra time for tests, quizzes, I am able to get 50% more time on my SAT.

Read full topic

item.title: Held back
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:4, topic:345492”]What is your scoring like, when I went to summer school if I got a 60+ I passed ofc I slacked off and got a 60%.

But if you pass your summer school then you don’t have to take the class again or stay back, you get the credit you lost when you failed the class during the school year.[/quote]ha im in 8th grade dude going into 9th (hopefully) so if u get below 70% u dont pass i guess

Read full topic

item.title: Held back
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

What is your scoring like, when I went to summer school if I got a 60+ I passed ofc I slacked off and got a 60%.

But if you pass your summer school then you don’t have to take the class again or stay back, you get the credit you lost when you failed the class during the school year.

Read full topic

item.title: Held back
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:2, topic:345492”]If my ict screw up counts, yeah.
But tell them if you can retake it or something; and if you get 90% you may pass, if you get anything else below 90% say you’ll gladly except an F/N.[/quote]wat?.. i got a 94% why would i retake it? im asking somebody who has an idea wat there talking about if theres a way i can get passed by showing my galileo scores

Read full topic
